alert.note: Alert for Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 4:59PM CDT until June 20 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN HOLT COUNTY... At 458 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Amelia, or 18 miles southwest of O`neill, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Atkinson, Stuart and Emmet. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 275 and 305. Highway 281 between mile markers 189 and 194. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
